summary: This document is a psychiatric observation update regarding Jeffrey Epstein's status in custody, specifically noting he is not on suicide watch. It appears to be an internal jail or prison communication from July 27, 2019, shortly before his death.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the psychiatric observation report, identified by his inmate number #76318-054. The document updates his status regarding suicide watch.

events.title: Psychiatric Observation Update for Epstein
events.description: An internal update regarding Jeffrey Epstein's psychiatric observation status in custody, noting he is not on suicide watch.

keyFacts: The document is dated July 27, 2019, which is approximately two weeks before Jeffrey Epstein's death on August 10, 2019.
It explicitly states that Jeffrey Epstein was not on suicide watch at the time of this update.
The document is an internal communication regarding Epstein's status in custody, likely from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York.
